narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Crawford County Mental Health Center is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Pittsburg, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $4.7M in Medicaid payments across 41K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $4.7M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
